snippet.title: Night Stones Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist Night Stones on Steam Now 🌙👉
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2300340/Night_Stones

Please subscribe, like and turn on notifications if you enjoyed the video!

Night Stones is an open world game developed in Unity inspired by the likes of Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, Final Fantasy VII, and Kingdom Hearts. This video is the game's trailer.

⌨️ Chat Night Stones & Gamedev on Discord 👋
https://discord.gg/eaGcV6rfKQ

🎵 MUSIC
Thanks to the amazing Jon Oster for writing such amazing music for the game -- check him out!
https://www.jonathanoster.com/music

🎨COVER ART
Provided by the talented Creative Penguin Studios team. Get in touch with them at hello@creativepenguinstudios.com

 #devlog #openworld #unity #indiedev
